jobs.title: Lead Full-Stack Developer
jobs.job-description:
We’re looking for a Lead Full-Stack Developer who thrives at the intersection of architecture, scalability, and product innovation. You’ll play a key role in designing and developing our next-generation SaaS platform — driving the end-to-end technical strategy across frontend, backend, and data systems.

You’ll lead engineering efforts that power seamless user experiences, data-driven insights, and high-performance APIs — while mentoring a growing team of developers. This role is ideal for someone passionate about building robust, extensible systems using modern web technologies like React, Node.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and cloud-native architectures.

What You’ll Do

Architect and implement full-stack systems powering our SaaS product — from frontend interfaces to backend services and API ecosystems.

Design scalable infrastructure for multi-tenant SaaS applications, focusing on performance, security, and data integrity.

Lead technical design discussions and guide decisions around architecture, integrations, and platform evolution.

Develop and maintain APIs and SDKs that enable integrations with third-party platforms, analytics tools, and client applications.

Work with product and design teams to translate business needs into technical solutions that deliver measurable impact.

Implement GraphQL schemas and resolvers to power modern, flexible data delivery to the frontend.

Oversee database design and optimization in PostgreSQL, ensuring data consistency, scalability, and efficient querying.

Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and CI/CD automation.

Drive system observability and performance monitoring using modern DevOps and cloud tools.

Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and data engineers to deliver new product features with technical excellence and operational reliability.

We’re Looking for Someone Who:

Has 7+ years of full-stack development experience, with at least 2 years in a technical leadership or senior developer role.

Possesses strong technical depth in modern web technologies — including React, Node.js (Express or NestJS), GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.

Demonstrates experience architecting scalable SaaS platforms or cloud-based enterprise systems.

Is fluent in API design, SDK development, and third-party integrations with an emphasis on maintainability and security.

Understands microservices, REST/GraphQL design patterns, and has a strong foundation in distributed systems.

Brings a solid grasp of frontend engineering principles — including state management, performance optimization, and component-driven design.

Is comfortable setting up and maintaining DevOps pipelines, CI/CD workflows, and cloud deployments (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

Communicates clearly and effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, and can make architecture decisions that align with product goals.

Values clean code, maintainability, documentation, and team empowerment as part of engineering excellence.

It’s a Plus If You:

Have led SaaS platform development from concept to launch in a startup or product-led company.

Have experience working with containerized environments (Docker, Kubernetes) or serverless frameworks.

Have implemented authentication and authorization systems (OAuth, JWT, SSO) for B2B/B2C SaaS applications.

Have familiarity with data analytics pipelines, event tracking systems, or integration with BI tools.

Have built developer-facing SDKs or APIs for platform extensibility.

Have hands-on experience with performance tuning, caching layers (Redis, Varnish), and asynchronous job queues.

Thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment where innovation and ownership are key.

Why Join Us

Shape the core architecture of a cutting-edge SaaS platform.

Work alongside talented engineers, product thinkers, and growth leaders.

Contribute to an engineering culture that values innovation, autonomy, and collaboration.

Competitive compensation, growth opportunities, and a focus on long-term technical excellence.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.job-description:
We are seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our engineering team in building high-quality, scalable, and secure software solutions that deliver meaningful value to our customers.

In this role, you’ll contribute to the design, development, and delivery of innovative software products — focusing on performance, usability, and system reliability. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and quality assurance engineers to turn complex business challenges into elegant, data-driven solutions.

This position offers an opportunity to work on cutting-edge applications, drive technical excellence, and be part of a collaborative, growth-oriented engineering culture.

Role & Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, scalable, and reusable software components and systems.

Build and enhance full-stack applications, integrating APIs, front-end interfaces, and backend services.

Own the full software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering and system design to implementation, testing, deployment, and ongoing support.

Develop high-quality technical documentation including design specifications, test plans, deployment procedures, and performance benchmarks.

Collaborate closely with QA engineers to ensure comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and system-level validation.

Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in production environments, ensuring system stability and reliability.

Continuously seek opportunities to optimize system performance, improve security, and enhance user experience.

Stay current with emerging technologies and contribute to the continuous improvement of engineering best practices.

About You

Strong programming experience in Python, JavaScript, or a similar modern language.

Familiarity with frameworks and technologies such as React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, or equivalent front-end tools.

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform is a plus.

Hands-on experience with containerized applications (Docker, Kubernetes) and CI/CD pipelines.

Solid understanding of relational and NoSQL databases, such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Elasticsearch.

Knowledge of distributed systems, event-driven architectures, or message queues (e.g., Kafka) is desirable.

Strong grasp of software engineering principles, design patterns, and agile development methodologies.

Proven ability to develop secure, large-scale web applications in a fast-paced environment.

Excellent problem-solving, debugging, and communication skills.

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field, or equivalent professional experience.

Why Join Us

Work on impactful software projects that solve real-world problems.

Be part of a collaborative, innovative, and agile engineering culture.

Opportunities for continuous learning, growth, and technical leadership.

Flexible work environment with an emphasis on autonomy, ownership, and results.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.job-description:
We’re looking for a SaaS Account Executive to join our growing team at PRL Insights & Partners. In this role, you’ll be responsible for driving new business growth and nurturing relationships with existing clients. You’ll serve as the face of our SaaS platform, understanding client needs, presenting tailored solutions, and closing high-impact deals that drive measurable business outcomes.

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in dynamic, data-driven sales environments, understands the SaaS customer lifecycle, and is passionate about helping organizations unlock the power of technology.

What You’ll Do

Convert inbound leads into qualified opportunities through effective discovery and consultative selling.

Identify and pursue new sales opportunities through networking, prospecting, and strategic outreach.

Present our SaaS platform and solutions to prospective clients — showcasing how our technology can improve their business performance.

Develop deep understanding of client needs to tailor product recommendations and maximize value realization.

Negotiate contracts and manage the full sales cycle from initial contact to close.

Maintain accurate records of sales activity, deal progress, and pipeline metrics in CRM tools.

Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, product, and customer success teams to ensure smooth handoffs and customer satisfaction.

Stay informed on market trends, competitor offerings, and SaaS industry developments.

About You

2+ years of experience in SaaS sales or account management (SaaS experience is required).

Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and revenue goals.

Experience selling B2B SaaS solutions in areas such as productivity, analytics, workflow automation, or marketing technology.

Strong consultative and solution-based selling skills, ideally following Challenger or GAP selling methodologies.

Excellent communication and negotiation skills — able to build rapport quickly and influence decision-makers.

Entrepreneurial mindset — you take initiative, adapt quickly, and thrive in fast-paced, growing environments.

Solid business acumen and understanding of the SaaS customer lifecycle (from acquisition to retention).

A passion for technology, innovation, and customer success.

Why You’ll Love Working With Us

100% remote-first culture with flexible working hours.

Collaborative, impact-driven environment where your ideas are valued.

Opportunity to grow within a rapidly scaling SaaS company.

Supportive leadership that values autonomy, accountability, and creativity.

A team that celebrates success — and enjoys building something meaningful together.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.job-description:
We’re looking for a Project Manager to lead the planning and execution of complex, multi-phase projects across our organization. This role plays a key part in ensuring that project delivery aligns with business objectives, customer expectations, and organizational strategy.

As a Project Manager, you will drive execution across teams, establish scalable processes, and serve as the bridge between customers, engineering, and business stakeholders. The ideal candidate is highly organized, detail-oriented, and skilled at managing multiple moving parts while maintaining a clear strategic vision.

This is a high-impact role that combines operational excellence, stakeholder management, and program strategy to deliver measurable business outcomes.

What You’ll Do

Plan, coordinate, and execute complex, multi-phase projects across cross-functional teams and business units.

Develop and manage project roadmaps, timelines, and deliverables, ensuring alignment with strategic goals and customer needs.

Implement and refine project governance frameworks, including progress reporting, risk management, and executive visibility.

Manage dependencies across parallel workstreams, ensuring effective collaboration between technical and business teams.

Standardize project delivery tools, templates, and best practices to drive consistency and efficiency across initiatives.

Serve as a trusted partner to both internal stakeholders and external clients, ensuring expectations are met and exceeded.

Lead stakeholder communications, including executive updates, steering committees, and milestone reporting.

Identify risks and proactively implement mitigation strategies to maintain project quality and timeliness.

Collaborate across Engineering, Product, Operations, and Customer Success teams to ensure seamless project delivery and continuous value creation.

Continuously improve project management methodologies and operational workflows to enhance scalability and impact.

About You

5+ years of project or program management experience, ideally within SaaS, software, or technology environments.

Proven experience managing cross-functional, multi-phase projects with diverse stakeholder groups.

Strong understanding of project governance, change management, and agile or hybrid delivery methodologies.

Excellent communication, presentation, and relationship-building skills, including experience with executive-level reporting.

Demonstrated ability to manage competing priorities, meet deadlines, and drive accountability across distributed teams.

Skilled in project management tools such as Jira, Asana, Smartsheet, or Monday.com.

Strong problem-solving, organizational, and analytical thinking skills.

PMP, PRINCE2, or Agile certification is considered an asset.

Bachelor’s degree in Business, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).

Willingness to travel occasionally for customer or team engagements.

Why Join Us

Opportunity to lead strategic, high-visibility projects with measurable business impact.

Work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment that values innovation and continuous improvement.

Partner with talented teams across technology, product, and business functions.

Flexible, growth-oriented culture that encourages ownership, accountability, and professional development.
